goal:
The Italian Association of Road Safety Professionals (www.aipss.it) is a not-for-profit association aiming at the promotion of road safety best practices and at the dissemination of road safety research results. AIPSS was established in 2009 in order to:
 promote the application of the results of research and professional development in the field of road safety;
 encourage the sharing of professional experiences and "best practices" in the field of road infrastructure safety management;
 facilitate communication and cooperation between the study groups on road safety and public or private entity responsible for the management of road infrastructure;
The associates are single professionals, Universities (ROMA TRE – Department of Civil Engineering and CTL-Centre for transport and logistics of University of Rome “La Sapienza”) consultancy companies (C&S Europe Consulting, EsseOtto srl)) and one road manager. ASTRAL (Azienda Strade Lazio, in charge of managing the road network of the Lazio Region)
